DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this study is to investigate the efficacy and dose-dependency of chrysanthemum flower oil in suppressing serum uric acid.
DOC.brief_title: Effect of Chrysanthemum Flower Oil and Its Dose-dependency on Hyperuricemia
DOC.criteria: Serum uric acid 6.88.9 mg/dL Taking antihyperuricemic drugs History of gouty attack Taking drugs or functional food that may affect serum uric acid level Hypertention, hyperlipidemia, or diabetes millitus Participation in any clinical trial within 90 days of the commencement of the trial Renal or hepatic dysfunction Heart disease History of severe disease and/or major surgery
